tool.name: Split sequences with c2e
tool.help:
**About**
This script is part of the mPuma pipeline. `c2e` splits each sequence by length `L` returning, for each sequence in FASTA format: The first `L` nucleotides of the input sequence. The first `L` nucleotides from the reverse complement of the input sequence.
**Usage**
The inputs are a FASTA nucleotide file (the resulting fasta from `mPuma-seqclean`) and a positive integer, and will result into a FASTA nucleotide file, with the double of registries as in the input.
**Contact**
Please send any request or comment to mikel.egana.aranguren@gmail.com
